entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 12:01 AM MDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 9. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 12:01 AM MDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Otherwise clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 12:01 AM MDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
